recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Teknik Informatika Multimedia, Teknik informatika, Teknologi Informasi, Teknologi Informatika Multimedia Digital (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability:
a.	Build and maintain user-friendly web applications.
b.	Work closely with our development and design teams to understand requirements and turn them into functional solutions.
c.	Participate in training sessions, workshops, and real project tasks.
d.	Develop problem-solving and coding skills through guided practice.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Majalengka, West Java. 
b.	Well verse in English, both spoken and written.
c.	Min.D3, preferably IT major. 
d.	Comprehend JavaScript (ES6+), modern frameworks, and front-end development principles.
e.	Strong interest in technology, problem-solving, or digital innovation.
